moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of raising the user’s Attack by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: X Attack
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Bend but Don’t Break!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def by 1 stat rank. Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

passives.name: Arresting Glare 1
passives.description: Has a chance (20%) of lowering the target’s Speed by one stat rank when the user is hit by a physical attack move.

passives.name: Backfire 2
passives.description: Lowers the Attack and Sp. Atk of all opposing sync pairs by 2 stat ranks just before the user faints.
